info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 1:43AM CDT until April 23 at 9:48AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County.
For the Sac River...including Caplinger Mills...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to late Wednesday morning.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 23.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.9 feet on 05/08/2002. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 145 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING
